verses.verse: <S%H8123>Samson<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnah,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnah<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

He came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and <S%H5046>said,<s%> "I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnah<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> now therefore <S%H3947>get<s%> her for me as <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

Then his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H369>him,<s%> "Is there never a <S%H802>woman<s%> among the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> or among all my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%>" <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3947>"Get<s%> her for <S%H3474>me;<s%> for she pleases me well."

But his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that it was of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for he <S%H1245>sought<s%> an <S%H8385>occasion<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> Now at that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnah,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H8553>Timnah:<s%> and <S%H3715>behold,<s%> a young <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H7580>roared<s%> against <S%H7125>him.<s%>

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H6743>mightily<s%> on <S%H8156>him,<s%> and he tore him as he would have <S%H8156>torn<s%> a young <S%H1423>goat;<s%> and he had <S%H3972>nothing<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> but he <S%H5046>didn't<s%> tell his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> what he had <S%H6213>done.<s%>
He went <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H1696>talked<s%> with the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and she <S%H3474>pleased<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3474>well.<s%>

After a <S%H3117>while<s%> he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H7725>her;<s%> and he turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4658>carcass<s%> of the <S%H738>lion:<s%> and <S%H7200>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H5712>swarm<s%> of <S%H1682>bees<s%> in the <S%H1472>body<s%> of the <S%H738>lion,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

He <S%H7287>took<s%> it into his <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and went <S%H3212>on,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> as he <S%H1980>went;<s%> and he came to his <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H398>them,<s%> and they ate: but he <S%H5046>didn't<s%> tell them that he had <S%H7287>taken<s%> the <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H1472>body<s%> of the <S%H738>lion.<s%>
His <S%H1>father<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H802>woman:<s%> and <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> there a <S%H4960>feast;<s%> for so used the young <S%H970>men<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%>
It <S%H7200>happened,<s%> when they saw <S%H3947>him,<s%> that they brought <S%H7970>thirty<s%> companions to be with <S%H4828>him.<s%>

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2330>them,<s%> "Let me tell you a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> <S%H5046>now.<s%> If you can <S%H5046>declare<s%> it to me within the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and find it <S%H4672>out,<s%> then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7970>thirty<s%> linen <S%H5466>garments<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>clothing;<s%>

but if you <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> it to <S%H5414>me,<s%> then you shall give me <S%H7970>thirty<s%> linen <S%H5466>garments<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>clothing.<s%>" They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2330>him,<s%> "Put forth your <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> that we may hear <S%H8085>it.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H398>them,<s%> "Out of the eater came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3978>food.<s%> Out of the <S%H5794>strong<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4966>sweetness.<s%>" They <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle.<s%>

It happened on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H6601>"Entice<s%> your <S%H376>husband,<s%> that he may <S%H5046>declare<s%> to us the <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> lest we <S%H8313>burn<s%> you and your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%> Have you <S%H7121>called<s%> us to impoverish <S%H3423>us?<s%> Is it not so?"

<S%H8123>Samson<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> before <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "You just <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H157>me,<s%> and don't love <S%H2330>me.<s%> You have put forth a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5046>haven't<s%> told it <S%H5046>me.<s%>" He said to <S%H559>her,<s%> "Behold, I haven't told it my <S%H1>father<s%> nor my <S%H517>mother,<s%> and shall I tell <S%H5046>you?<s%>"

She <S%H1058>wept<s%> before him the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> while their <S%H4960>feast<s%> <S%H1961>lasted:<s%> and it happened on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H6693>her,<s%> because she pressed him severely; and she <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of her <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> before the <S%H2775>sun<s%> went <S%H935>down,<s%> "What is <S%H4966>sweeter<s%> than <S%H1706>honey?<s%> What is <S%H5794>stronger<s%> than a <S%H738>lion?<s%>" He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3884>them,<s%> "If you <S%H2790>hadn't<s%> plowed with my <S%H5697>heifer,<s%> you <S%H4672>wouldn't<s%> have found out my <S%H2420>riddle.<s%>"

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> mightily on <S%H3381>him,<s%> and he went down to <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5221>them,<s%> and took their <S%H2488>spoil,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H2487>changes<s%> of clothing to those who <S%H5046>declared<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle.<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled,<s%> and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>
But <S%H8123>Samson<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> was given to his <S%H4828>companion,<s%> whom he had used as his <S%H7462>friend.<s%>
